price: [Saalihis] ni jedhe: “Yaa ummata kiyya! Maaliif toltuu dura hamtuu (adabbii) jarjarsiifattu? maaliif Rabbiin araarama hin kadhanne Akka rahmanni isinii godhamuuf?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰقَوۡمِ لِمَ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ قَبۡلَ ٱلۡحَسَنَةِۖ لَوۡلَا تَسۡتَغۡفِرُونَ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāqawmi lima tastaʿjilūna bil-sayi-ati qabla al-ḥasanati lawlā tastaghfirūna al-laha laʿallakum tur'ḥamūna
